name: Improving Weapons
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Robot Instruction Disc (Improve Weapons) ( ie #L "Robot Instruction Disc (Improve Slashing Weapons)" "155533" ) #L "Mass Relocating Robot" "155592" #L "Symbol Library - Space" "144790" #L "Photon Particle Emitter" "144812" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Robot Instruction Disc (Improve Weapons) + Symbol Library - Space = Robot Compiled Algorithm (Improve Weapons) ( ie : #L "Robot Compiled Algorithm (Improve Slashing Weapons)" "155534" ) Skills: | NP,CL | ------------------------------ Photon Particle Emitter + Robot Compiled Algorithm (Improve Weapons) = Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Improve Weapons) ( ie : #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Improve Slashing Weapons)" "155544" ) Skills: | NP | ------------------------------ Mass Relocating Robot + Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Improve Weapons) = Mass Relocating Robot (Improve Weapons) ( ie : #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Improve Slashing Weapons)" "155594" ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Uses ------------------------------ Once you have your Mass Relocating Robot (Improve Weapons), you can now use it to improve some weapons, of which you'll find the list, depending of the the type of your Mass Relocating Robot. Improve Crushing Weapons Advanced Baseballbat Club Stun-Baton Improve Slashing Weapons Tripler Whings Cutlass Meatcleaver Zenith Taichi Burning Crescent Improve Thrusting Weapons Slank Chop Gofleprod Click Stabber ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ The best thing to do is compare, before the process : #L "Grandmaster Click Stabber" "152776", and afterward :#L "Much Improved Click Stabber" "157820".
